top.title: Putin says Russia will take Donbas by force or Ukraine's troops will withdraw
top.summary: The Russian leader's comments come as US and Ukrainian negotiators are due to hold a new round of talks.

top.title: Admiral testified Hegseth did not give 'kill them all' order, US lawmakers say
top.summary: The admiral who gave the order for a second strike on an alleged drug boat briefed lawmakers about the incident, as the military confirmed another attack.

top.title: Arrest over fire petition stirs public debate in Hong Kong
top.summary: Miles Kwan was detained after he launched a petition demanding answers from Hong Kong authorities.

top.title: Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom
top.summary: The regulator tells the BBC it has been emailing AVS Group Ltd without reply since July.

top.title: New homes delayed by 'energy-hungry' data centres
top.summary: The London Assembly found the growth of new data centres temporarily halted building some houses in 2022.

top.title: Production halted at Chinese factory making 'childlike' sex dolls
top.summary: The issue is in the spotlight after Shein announced a global ban on the sale of sex dolls with a childlike appearance.
